DOC.brief_summary: The trial propose multicenter treatment protocol design examine transplant related event patient Fanconi anemia lack match sib donor severe aplastic anemia ( SAA ) , myelodysplastic syndrome ( MDS ) acute myelogenous leukemia ( AML ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The trial propose single arm phase II multicenter treatment protocol design examine engraftment , toxicity , graft-versus-host disease , ultimate disease-free survival follow novel cytoreductive regimen include busulfan , cyclophosphamide fludarabine ATG ( Anti-thymocyte globulin ) treatment patient Fanconi anemia severe aplastic anemia ( SAA ) , myelodysplastic syndrome ( MDS ) acute myelogenous leukemia ( AML ) , lack HLA-genotypically ( HLA = human leukocyte antigen ) identical donor use stem cell transplant derive HLA-compatible unrelated donor HLA haplotype-mismatched related donor use Miltenyi 's CliniMACS .
DOC.criteria: Confirmed Diagnosis Fanconi Anemia One following : Severe Aplastic Anemia Severe Single Lineage Cytopenia ; Myelodysplastic Syndrome ; Acute Myelogenous Leukemia Unrelated Related Donors Adequate Physical Function ( Cardiac , Hepatic , Renal , Pulmonary ) Available LongTerm Follow Up Performance status > = 70 % Coexisting medical problem increase risk transplant Active CNS ( central nervous system ) leukemic involvement Pregnant Breastfeeding ( Females ) Active , Uncontrolled Infection HIV/HTLV ( Human Tlymphotropic virus ) Positive
